definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: The deputy of these travelers was despatched to take the news to the travel agency.
sentences.chinese: 这些旅游者的代理人被派遣去送口信给旅行社。

sentences.english: Mr Ball has just called on Ms Zhu to give her a message.
sentences.chinese: 鲍尔先生刚刚来拜访朱女士，带给她一个口信。

sentences.english: I started as soon as your message got through to me.
sentences.chinese: 我一接到你的口信儿，马上就动身了。

sentences.english: Mr. Ball has just called on Mrs. Zhu to give her a message.
sentences.chinese: 鲍尔先生拜访朱夫人给她捎个口信。

sentences.english: Tang first conveyed an oral message of President Hu Jintao.
sentences.chinese: 唐家璇首先转达了胡锦涛主席的口信。

sentences.english: The answering machine bleeped and I left my message.
sentences.chinese: 应答器发出哔哔声，我留下了一则口信。

sentences.english: Did Mr. Golspie leave any message for anybody ?
sentences.chinese: 戈尔斯培先生给谁留下口信了？

sentences.english: It was a strange message, and a stranger answer.
sentences.chinese: 口信儿是奇特的，而答复就更奇特了。

sentences.english: Does China have any message for President Sarkozy?
sentences.chinese: 中方是否有口信要传递给萨科齐总统？

sentences.english: Dumbledore sent a message to Hagrid using this spell.
sentences.chinese: 邓布利多在给海格送口信的时候用到了这个咒语。

sentences.english: This is a recording. Please leave a message after the beep. Thank you.
sentences.chinese: 请你在哔一声之后留低你的口信啦。

sentences.english: Li Ming calls Evans & Sons Co. Ltd. and leaves a message.
sentences.chinese: 李明打电话给艾文斯有限公司并留下口信。

sentences.english: Can I leave a message for Mr Li?
sentences.chinese: 我能给李先生留个口信吗？

definition: to pass on a story/to communicate a message
to take a letter/to send word
to send word/to deliver a letter
to bring sth to sb (news etc)
to leave word/to leave a message
to bring sth to sb/to deliver
to reply/to write back/letter written in reply/CL:封[feng1]
to report on completion of a mission/debriefing
